title: Legendary Spinning Axes
body: Does the promo work if the legendary skin comes from hextech chests? Got 2 of those with enough essence, if not then they can rot in hell.

replies.body:
Can't imagine it happening, no.
It says if you buy or are gifted a legendary or ultimate skin. I'm assuming Hextech Chests don't count as buying or getting gifted.

technically its a gift for your effort?

http://imgur.com/IfZsJFP

also, it says pick up, nothing about buying or gifting so...
